# getKeylessTxn() function

Generate a transaction to be sent with a keyless signer.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function getKeylessTxn(
  transaction: ethers.UnsignedTransaction,
  signature: string,
): KeylessTransaction;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter   | Type                       | Description                   |
| ----------- | -------------------------- | ----------------------------- |
| transaction | ethers.UnsignedTransaction | : Unsigned transaction object |
| signature   | string                     | : Signature bytes             |

**Returns:**

KeylessTransaction
